detail_desc: Sandals with open heels and toes, lacing and covered block heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Sandals with covered block heels and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Sandals with covered block heels and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Sandals with covered block heels and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.

Imitation suede boots with an open section at the back with an adjustable tab with concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 7.5 cm.

Ankle boots in imitation leather with open heels and toes, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and covered block heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 11 cm.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Mesh inner shorts.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Mesh inner shorts.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Mesh inner shorts.
Swimsuit in UV-protective material with a print motif at the top, small stand-up collar and a zip at the back. Short raglan sleeves and short legs. UPF50.
Swimsuit in UV-protective material with a print motif at the top, small stand-up collar and a zip at the back. Short raglan sleeves and short legs. UPF50.
Swimsuit in UV-protective material with a print motif at the top, small stand-up collar and a zip at the back. Short raglan sleeves and short legs. UPF50.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, button fly, lower crotch and skinny, tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Swim top and swim shorts in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small stand-up collar. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Swim top and swim shorts in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small stand-up collar. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Swim top and swim shorts in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small stand-up collar. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Swim top and swim shorts in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small stand-up collar. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with lined cups and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that double at the back. Wide elastication at the hem and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms that hold in and shape the waist and hips. Gathers in the sides, gentle draping at the front and medium coverage at the back.
Tube scarf and double-layered hat in soft jersey.
Tube scarf and double-layered hat in soft jersey.
Tube scarf and double-layered hat in soft jersey.
Tube scarf and double-layered hat in soft jersey.
Tube scarf and double-layered hat in soft jersey.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a frill at the top that continues over the shoulders.
Long, sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with smocking at the top and narrow, bow-topped shoulder straps. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (in sizes 0-12M).
Sleeveless dress with a patterned satin bodice with appliqués, a small stand-up collar and a concealed zip at the back. Skirt in a double layer of tulle. Lined.
Cropped, straight-cut jacket in sturdy cotton twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, side pockets, and a raw-edge flounce front and back.
Shorts in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and a lace trim at the hems.
Shorts in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and a lace trim at the hems.
Shorts in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and a lace trim at the hems.
Shorts in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and a lace trim at the hems.

Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Pockets in the side seams, a fake welt back pocket and straight legs with creases front and back and stripes down the sides.

Cigarette trousers in cotton corduroy with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem with creases front and back.

Flared skirt in washed, slightly stretchy cotton twill with buttons at the top and decorative buttons at the hem. Adjustable, elasticated waist with covered, gathered elastication at the back, and pockets in the side seams.
Low ankle boots in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with pointed toes, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a V-neck. Lace trim around the neckline and down the front.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a V-neck. Lace trim around the neckline and down the front.
Nursing sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads. Mesh racer back and a wide elastic hem.
Nursing sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads. Mesh racer back and a wide elastic hem.

Short, V-neck dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and buttons at the top. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a decorative belt with a metal buckle.

Knee-length, flared skirt in woven fabric with a sheen. Regular waist with elastication at the back and pleats at the front, covered buttons down the front and side pockets. Unlined.

Set with a shirt, bow tie and pair of trousers with braces. Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs. Pre-tied bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap an a plastic fastener at the back. Trousers in cotton twill with side pockets and detachable elastic braces with imitation leather details.

Imitation suede sandals with cylindrical heels covered in braided paper straw. Elastic gores in the sides and ankle straps with an adjustable metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9 cm.
